title: Man: one family
creator_contributor_role: British Ministry of Information, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Political persecution
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Political atrocities
description: A refutation of the Nazi theory of the "master" race, this film shows scientifically that there is no basis for the common and persistent belief that there is such a thing as race superiority. The film was translated into sixteen different languages for use in liberated Europe after World War II.
